payload.content: Anna Goldie and Azalia Mirhoseini developed AlphaChip at Google, which utilized AI to design four generations of TPUs and significantly reduced chip floor planning time from months to hours.

name: Anna Goldie and Azalia Mirhoseini developed AlphaChip at Google, which utilized
content: Anna Goldie and Azalia Mirhoseini developed AlphaChip at Google, which utilized AI to design four generations of TPUs and significantly reduced chip floor planning time from months to hours.

payload.content: Chip design currently represents a critical bottleneck for AI progress, typically requiring years and hundreds of millions of dollars.

name: Chip design currently represents a critical bottleneck for AI progress, typicall
content: Chip design currently represents a critical bottleneck for AI progress, typically requiring years and hundreds of millions of dollars.

payload.content: Ricursive Intelligence aims to enable an evolution in the chip industry from 'fabless' to 'designless,' allowing any company to create custom silicon.

name: Ricursive Intelligence aims to enable an evolution in the chip industry from 'fa
content: Ricursive Intelligence aims to enable an evolution in the chip industry from 'fabless' to 'designless,' allowing any company to create custom silicon.

payload.content: Ricursive Intelligence envisions a future of recursive self-improvement where AI designs more powerful and faster chips, thereby accelerating AI itself.

content: Ricursive Intelligence envisions a future of recursive self-improvement where AI designs more powerful and faster chips, thereby accelerating AI itself.
